item.title: VCAP6.5-DCV Design Experience
item.description: So today I successfully passed the VMware Certified Advanced Professional 6.5 â€“ Data Center Virtualization Design Exam 3V0-624! I had set a personal goal at the beginning of the year, that I would pass the VCAP6-DCV Design and unfortunately after months of studying I took it and failed in March. I was ready to give up based on the cost of the exam and the time i spent studying. However, I found out recently that a new version based on 6.
